title: 49ers Quarterback drama; Confidence level in Packers; Time for Kyler to Grow Up? Rams repeat chances
itunes:title: 49ers Quarterback drama; Confidence level in Packers; Time for Kyler to Grow Up? Rams repeat chances
description:
The latest edition of The Good Morning Football Podcast examines how the San Francisco 49ers should handle the situation between Jimmy Garoppolo and Trey Lance. Hosts Rachel Bonnetta, Peter Schrager, Kyle Brandt, and former Pro Bowler Dante Hall look at the state of the Green Bay Packers and share their confidence level in them now that Aaron Rodgers’ #1 weapon is gone. Then the Good Morning Football crew accesses the drama between Kyler Murray and the Arizona Cardinals; they share their thoughts on the likelihood of the Los Angeles Rams repeating as Super Bowl champions; and they finish up exploring what the Seattle Seahawks should do at the quarterback position.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
